event.title: reported by the Ministry of Health of the People's Republic of China for the first three months

data.event: 41,846 reported cases and 18 children's deaths have arisen from Hand, foot and mouth disease (HFMD) as reported by the Ministry of Health of the People's Republic of China for the first three months of 2009.
Heze city alone has registered 1,734 cases, 440 of which came in last Friday.

event.title: died from HFMD just last week

data.event: Five babies here died from HFMD just last week.

event.title: time of contact to appearance of symptoms between three to seven days

data.event: There is an Incubation period from time of contact to appearance of symptoms between three to seven days.
